batch.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Batch compute environment.
Grants permission to delete an AWS Batch compute environment
Grants permission to describe one or more AWS Batch compute environments
Grants permission to submit an AWS Batch job from a job definition.
Grants permission to terminate a job in an AWS Batch job queue.
Grants permission to cancel a job in an AWS Batch job queue.
Grants permission to create an AWS Batch job queue.
Grants permission to delete an AWS Batch job queue.
Grants permission to register an AWS Batch job definition.
Grants permission to deregister an AWS Batch job definition
Grants permission to create an AWS Batch scheduling policy.
Grants permission to delete an AWS Batch scheduling policy.
Grants permission to list jobs for a specified AWS Batch job queue.
Grants permission to list AWS Batch scheduling policies.
Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Batch resource.
Grants permission to tag an AWS Batch resource.
Grants permission to untag an AWS Batch resource in your account.
